error.sswaystones.no_dimension: The dimension you are trying to teleport to no longer exists!
error.sswaystones.not_enough_xp: You must obtain %s more experience level(s) to teleport!
error.sswaystones.invalid_waystone: The waystone you are trying to teleport has been removed!
error.sswaystones.combat_cooldown: You may not use waystones while in combat!
error.sswaystones.no_create_permission: You do not have permission to create Waystones!
error.sswaystones.no_modification_permis: There are no settings available for this waystone!
gui.sswaystones.change_icon_instruction: Click on an item in your inventory to set the icon!
gui.sswaystones.access_settings_instruct: Click the icons to toggle the settings
config.sswaystones.xp_cost: How many XP levels using a waystone costs. (0 to disable)
config.sswaystones.cross_dimension_xp_co: How many XP levels using a waystone cross-dimension costs. (0 to disable)
config.sswaystones.paranoid_teleport: Enables several checks to make sure waystones aren't trapped when true.
config.sswaystones.remove_invalid_waysto: Removes invalid waystones when they are removed in the world but not in the records.
config.sswaystones.combat_cooldown: Disallows using waystones for a configurable amount of time after being hit by a player.
